mapper.select: select cust_id, cust_name, to_char(create_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm') as create_date, to_char(update_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm') as update_date, phone_num, roadaddr, detailaddr, emp_id from customers order by cust_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into customers (cust_id, cust_name, password, phone_num, roadaddr, detailaddr) values (#{custId}, #{custName}, '1234', #{phoneNum}, #{roadAddr}, #{detailAddr})
mapper.select: select o.order_id, o.cust_id, c.cust_name, o.prod_id, p.prod_name, to_char(o.prod_quan, 'FM9,999,999') AS prodQuan, to_char(o.order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm') as orderDate, o.emp_id, to_char(o.sale_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm') as saleDate, o.order_status from orders o left join customers c on o.cust_id = c.cust_id left join product p on o.prod_id = p.prod_id ORDER BY order_id DESC
select p.prod_name, o.prod_quan, o.order_status, to_char(o.sale_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm') as sale_date from orders o left join product p on o.prod_id = p.prod_id where order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: update orders set emp_id = #{empId}, sale_date = sysdate, order_status = 2 where order_id = ${orderId}
